title: Why do I not want to tell people what music I listen to? - Quora

response.answer_text: ok i relate EXTREMELY. i listen to like classic rock nd 80s nd 90s pop. before my current friends, i told everyone that i listened to trippie, travis, etc. i was so scared of them making fun of me. especially bc then i didn’t have as much control of myself as i do now. once i started making actual friends, i realized that what i was feeling was irrational. maybe it’s your friend group tour maybe your music is just super personal to yu. either way it doesn’t matter if yu don’t wanna tell people. all that matters is that you’re happy wit whatever
